mapper.select: select case when b.user_id = #{userID} then 'true' else 'false' end as is_registered ,e.registered_count as registered_count ,coalesce(a.event_detail,'') as event_detail ,coalesce(c.nickname,concat(substr(c.phone,1,3),'****',substr(c.phone,8)) ) as organizer_name ,coalesce(concat(substr(c.phone,1,3),'****',substr(c.phone,8)),'') as phone ,coalesce(c.profile_picture,'') as profile_image ,coalesce(d.user_level,'99') as organizer_level from event a left join event_registration b on a.event_id = b.event_id and b.my_status = 1 and b.user_id = #{userID} and b.event_id = #{eventID} left join user_info c on a.organizer_id = c.user_id left join user_detail d on c.user_id = d.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT event_id,COUNT(user_id) as registered_count from event_registration where event_id = #{eventID} GROUP BY event_id ) e on a.event_id = e.event_id where a.event_id = #{eventID}
